# prometheus-ebay
## 3.5.5
* Add NODE-4698: push nodejs app init time metrics into sherlockio

## 3.5.4
* Fixed Types

## 3.5.0
* NODE-4221: Switched `prom-client` to open source for exemplers

## 3.2.1
* Expose Registry from prom-client

## 3.2.0
* Exposed metrics classes from prom-client to manage dependencies, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3046

# 3.1.0
* Added Typescript support, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3679

# 3.0.7
* Added functionality to reset and clear the metrics

# 3.0.2
Fix: Seperated metrics content with content-type for `text/plain` and `application/openmetrics-text`

# 3.0.1
* Fix: Added check for `isRecording` to check if request is sampled or not. https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3798

# 3.0.0
* Added Exempler support, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3703

# 2.6.0
* Remove direct dependency on @ebay/monitor-inc, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3322

# 2.5.3
* Rolled back PrometheusNamespaces introduced 2.5.0

# 2.5.2
* Added: Skip HTTP metrics for WarmUP Urls
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3250

# 2.5.0 and 2.5.1
* Rolled back to 2.4.0
* The module should not include validate-internals-ebay to avoid cyclical dependency.

# 2.5.0
* Added: Create the PrometheusNamespaces in Raptor.IO, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3094

# 2.4.0
* Added namespace support for easy access via validate internals, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2922

# 2.3.0
* Add a way to add platform metrics for other platform modules, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2906

# 2.2.7
* Moved monitor-inc to dev dependencies

# 2.2.6
* Fixed NPE when req.ebay context is not available

# 2.2.5
* Should ignore TSL header for http protocol

# 2.2.4
* Fixed http/https metrics to HTTP/HTTPS
* Excluded qualyscan request from TSL/proto metrics

# 2.2.3
* Upgrade to latest utils-ebay TLS versions headers mappings per review

# 2.2.2
* Moved start of time recording to the start of middleware

# 2.2.1
* Fixed NPE related to previous release

# 2.2.0
* Added TLS info metrics, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2601

# 2.1.0
* Removed Summary from platform metrics
* Renamed Histogram from `http_server_requests_histogram_duration_ms` to `http_server_requests_duration_ms`
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2579

# 2.0.0
* Split metrics to `platform` & `application`
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2517

# 1.1.4
* Set default value as true for interceptRequest in config file, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2413

# 1.1.3
* Added `processId` dimension to Prometheus metrics

# 1.1.2
* Added flags in config.json to enable or disable prometheus in VI (enabled by default)
* Added flags in config.json to enable or disable intercepting HTTP request(disabled by default)
* Added configurable histogram buckets

# 1.1.1
* New spec changes, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2110, https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TRDfYU3rkoPTj92qAGfR1KsoIJ54VI-2xFPsilZAI6o/edit#heading=h.n772z5j1r192


# 1.1.0
* Updated metrics metadata per aggrement on names between raptor and node.js stacks, https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TRDfYU3rkoPTj92qAGfR1KsoIJ54VI-2xFPsilZAI6o/edit#

# 1.0.2
* Fixed Memory leak issue

# 1.0.0
* Initial Version
